message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your desire to save, $9,000 is quite a bit below my initial asking price. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'd be willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
